Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This kit contains everything you need, obviously it is not a super professional kit but honestly comparing the camera and the quality of the pictures that it takes with others similar in the market I can quarantee that this camera is one of the best.All the accesories are pretty cool, the carger is awesome and the price for everything is perfect. Excellent choice for me....

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix
Reviews.Author: meeka
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I took it to a zoo and got close up pics of animals that were at a distance and friends were impressed at the clarity of the pictures. You do have to read about the different functions so you can operate the camera to get the best pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mary Tate
Reviews.Content: Great package. good service! I liked all the parts of the package, the case was good size and perfect all the attachments.

Reviews.Title: Complete Rip off
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: Be sure to read the fine print.  From the title you would expect to get the S4500, you do not.  You actually get the S4200, not a big difference, but......

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Tamas Juhasz "Jaszkali"
Reviews.Content: The product was shipped super fast. Product as advertised and maybe even better. Best camera I have seen for the cost. Will recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: I love Fugifilm
Reviews.Author: RockMom
Reviews.Content: the best camera's I have ever owned and easy to use is Fugifilm.Had bought others ( point and shoots) and they dont compare to this camera.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Fine Pix S2950
Reviews.Author: Commandergpt
Reviews.Content: The product was shipped super fast.  Product as advertised and maybe even better.  Best camera I have seen for the cost.  Will recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: False advertisement ( do not buy)
Reviews.Author: Alicia Sanchez
Reviews.Content: You do not get the S4500, you get a S4200.  All the items included in this package are of a very low quality. Horrible service to make things worse....got the camera almost a week after i order it....(paid for next day delivery).. yeah got a refund on the delivery...but still the service sucks.... if you decide to buy, Good luck on getting whats advertised...Do not Buy

Reviews.Title: FinePix S4500 Isn't
Reviews.Author: W. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The camera included in the "S4500" is not an S4500. The camera is an S4200-not a big difference, but still. The accessories are fine and all-in-all, still a fairly good deal except for the camera model difference, which is basicly a shorter zoom.I'd recommend it as long as the buyers know that the advert is misleading. As a tip, ignore the Amazon description and scroll down to the end of the product description on anything you buy from amzon from now on.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing I absolutely love it! Few minor problem but with time am sure I would figure it out

Reviews.Title: Ok product
Reviews.Author: Rachel Saul
Reviews.Content: This is an okay starter camera.  If I had it to do over again, I would've spent the extra few bucks on a Cannon.  However, the seller was great and the product arrived quickly with all items included.  I would definitely purchase from them again…but I don't recommend this camera, the resolution isn't great and it's a bit more out-dated than I expected in terms of menu functions.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Fine Pix Camera
Reviews.Author: franwheeler
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my granddaughter as she is going to be taking a "photography course" in high school this next year.  She was thrilled and has used it every day.  The pixs seem to be excellent.

Reviews.Title: Ashley Fuji camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Hale
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my 14 year old daughter. She already has an amazing picture taking ability, now she has the amazing camera to go with it! I'm a very happy customer!

Reviews.Title: The camera is nice.
Reviews.Author: Chris Long
Reviews.Content: It is a nice camera but still trying to figure it out. Is going to take some practice using it as just taking it right from the box and using it, some of the pictures have been a little blurry.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my niece.  She loves it and says it was easy to learn to operate. The pictures look so clear.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: J. GAYLE "jules799"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a starter camera for my teenage son and it takes really great pictures. You have to get rechargeable batteries because it drains batteries quickly. I liked this package because it came with so many batteries. The tripod is very small and we got a good laugh out of it. Otherwise it was a good combo back. The case was a good one.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.0Mp Resolution
3.0" LCD Display
24-720mm Fujinon 30x Optical Zoom Lens
SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Storage
1280 x 720 HD Video Capture
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S4500 Digital Camera (Black) Super Accessory Saver 8GB NiMH Battery/Rapid Charger Bundle
